title: AFC Asian Cup: India placed in Group B with Australia; hosts Qatar in Group A alongside China
content:

The top two teams from each of the six groups will directly qualify for the round of 16 while the four best third-placed teams will join them in the knockouts to make up the numbers.This is the first time the Indian men have qualified for the tournament finals two editions in a row.India finished third in their group in the AFC Asian Cup qualifying second round.
